pageSubtitle: Vagrant is the command line utility for managing the lifecycle of virtual machines.

cards.description: The package format for Vagrant environments - create your own or use one from the public catalog.

cards.description: Describe your virtual machine's configuration and how to provision it.

cards.description: Provisioners allow you to automatically install software, alter configurations, and more.

cards.description: Create and configure your virtual machine with the single most important Vagrant CLI command.
cards.title: The 'up' command

cards.description: Sync files from your host machine to the guest machine.

cards.description: Access your virtual machines through the high-level networking set up by Vagrant.

marketingContentBlocks.title: Vagrant Cloud
marketingContentBlocks.description: Vagrant Cloud serves a public, searchable index of Vagrant boxes.

cards.description: Use the public catalog to find boxes that contain the technologies you need for your Vagrant environment.
